item.title: 利雅得航空公司首席执行官称航空公司供应链问题开始改善
item.description: 沙特新成立的利雅得航空公司（Riyadh Air）首席执行官周四表示，主要飞机制造商波音公司和空中客车公司的供应链正显示出适度改善的迹象。【原文：Supply chains for major planemakers Boeing and Airbus are showing signs of moderate improvement, the chief executive of Saudi start-up Riyadh Air said on Thursday.】

item.title: 宝马公司高管认为无需达成特别协议以避免美国关税
item.description: 宝马首席采购官表示，宝马认为没有必要与美国谈判一项特殊协议以避免进口关税，并指出该汽车制造商在美国的业务规模庞大，而且与美国政府官员关系良好。【原文：BMW does not see the need to negotiate a special deal with the United States to avoid import tariffs, its chief purchasing officer said, pointing to the carmaker's sizeable presence in the country and good relations with U.S. government officials.】

item.title: 美国炼油商考虑转用替代性轻质原油，因担心特朗普征收关税
item.description: 高管们表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对从美国最大原油供应国加拿大和墨西哥进口的原油征收关税，美国顶级炼油商准备寻求重质酸性原油的替代来源，包括生产更多的国产原油。【原文：Top U.S. refiners are poised to seek alternative sources for heavy, sour crudes, including running more domestic grades, as they await clarity around U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened tariffs on imports from the nation's top crude suppliers Canada and Mexico, executives said.】

item.title: 苏里南政府需要为 2025 年的大型能源项目筹资 15 亿美元
item.description: 苏里南国有公司负责人告诉路透社，苏里南国有公司今年需要获得前所未有的 15 亿美元银行融资，以确保能够参与该国的 Gran Morgu 能源项目。【原文：Suriname's Staatsolie needs to secure an unprecedented $1.5 billion in bank financing this year to ensure it can participate in the country's Gran Morgu energy project, the head of the state-owned company told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国前能源部长格兰霍姆加入爱迪生国际公司和苏格兰爱迪生公司董事会
item.description: 美国前能源部长、曾连任两届密歇根州州长的民主党人詹妮弗-格兰霍姆（Jennifer Granholm）已被任命为爱迪生国际公司及其子公司南加州爱迪生公司（Southern California Edison）的董事会成员，自 4 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Jennifer Granholm, the former U.S. secretary of energy and a Democratic two-term governor of Michigan, has been appointed to the boards of Edison International and its subsidiary, Southern California Edison, effective April 1, the company announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 马斯克说他正在考虑对美联储进行审计
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，他正在考虑对美联储进行审计，此前他曾呼吁加强对央行的审查。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said on Thursday he is thinking of auditing the Federal Reserve, after calling for greater scrutiny of the central bank in the past.】

item.title: 墨西哥快餐连锁店古兹曼-约-戈麦斯 2025 年利润将超预期
item.description: 在澳大利亚上市的墨西哥主题快餐连锁店古兹曼-戈麦斯（Guzman y Gomez）周五表示，其上半年盈利几乎翻了一番，这使其有望超过上市不到一年前提出的 2025 财年盈利预期。【原文：Australia-listed Mexican-themed fast-food chain Guzman y Gomez said on Friday its first-half earnings nearly doubled, putting it firmly on track to surpass its fiscal 2025 profit forecast provided before its listing less than a year ago.】

item.title: 中国泡沫红茶连锁企业 Mixue 拟在香港首次公开募股中融资 4.43 亿美元
item.description: 据周五提交的一份监管文件显示，中国最大的泡沫红茶和饮料公司美雪集团正寻求在香港首次公开募股中融资34.5亿港元（4.4366亿美元）。【原文：China's largest bubble tea and drinks firm, Mixue Group, is seeking to raise HK$3.45 billion ($443.66 million) in a Hong Kong initial public offering, according to a regulatory filing made on Friday.】

item.title: 库格勒称，美联储应在 "一段时间内 "保持政策利率稳定
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里亚娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周四表示，她认为美国央行应将短期借贷成本目标维持在目前的4.25%-4.50%区间，因为该区间对经济和仍然高企的通胀起到了适度的抑制作用。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler on Thursday said she believes the U.S. central bank should leave its target for short-term borrowing costs in its current 4.25%-4.50% range, where it is exerting moderate restraint on the economy and on still-elevated inflation.】

item.title: 精神航空 7.95 亿美元债务交易获法院批准
item.description: 美国破产法官周四批准了精神航空公司的债务重组，允许这家廉价航空公司将 7.95 亿美元的债务转为股权，并以私营公司的身份摆脱破产。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Thursday approved Spirit Airlines' debt restructuring, clearing the budget airline to convert $795 million in debt to equity and emerge from bankruptcy as a private company.】

item.title: 国际旅游需求强劲，Booking Holdings 第四季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受国际旅游需求旺盛的推动，在线旅行社 Booking Holdings 周四公布的第四季度利润和营收超出分析师预期，盘后股价上涨约 5%。【原文：Online travel agency Booking Holdings surpassed analysts' expectation for fourth-quarter profit and revenue on Thursday, helped by booming demand for international travel, sending its shares up about 5% after the bell.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称通胀风险依然存在，并提到经济政策的不确定性
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周四表示，美国通胀率要达到美联储2%的目标仍有 "一段路要走"，而且通往这一目标的道路依然崎岖不平。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Thursday U.S. inflation still has "some way to go" to reach the Fed's 2% target, and that its path toward that goal continues to be bumpy.】

item.title: 亚洲：关税和滞胀引发不安，谨慎情绪占据上风
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国房地产公司 CoStar 拟以 17 亿美元收购澳大利亚 Domain 公司
item.description: 澳大利亚 Domain Holdings 公司周五表示，美国在线房地产公司 CoStar 已提出收购这家房地产分类公司，交易估值为 26.5 亿澳元（17.0 亿美元）。【原文：Australia's Domain Holdings said on Friday that U.S. online real estate firm CoStar had offered to buy the property classifieds firm in a deal valuing it at A$2.65 billion ($1.70 billion).】

item.title: 努比亚银行第四季度调整后利润增长 87
item.description: 巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 周四公布，其第四季度调整后净利润同比增长 87%。【原文：Brazilian digital lender Nubank posted on Thursday an 87% increase in its fourth-quarter adjusted net profit from a year earlier.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Celsius 将以 18 亿美元收购竞争对手能量饮料品牌 Alani Nu
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，Celsius 将以 18 亿美元的价格收购竞争对手能量饮料品牌 Alani Nu。【原文：Celsius is set to acquire rival energy drink brand Alani Nu for $1.8 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 黄金产量和价格上涨，纽蒙特第四季度利润超出预期
item.description: 纽蒙特公司周四公布的第四季度利润超过了分析师的预期，这家全球最大的黄金开采商受益于金银价格的反弹。【原文：Newmont beat analysts' estimate for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as the world's biggest gold miner benefited from a rally in bullion prices.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 第四季度净利润超出预期
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周四公布的季度净利润好于预期，比去年同期增长了近四倍。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre posted on Thursday a better-than-expected quarterly net profit, up nearly four-fold from the same period a year earlier.】

item.title: Rivian 公司预测，由于需求受阻，交付情况不容乐观
item.description: 由于工厂升级和供应商重新谈判提高了电动汽车制造商的效率，Rivian 公司在第四季度首次报告了正收益率，并预测今年的毛利润不会太高。【原文：Rivian forecast modest gross profit this year, after reporting its first-ever positive earnings margin in the fourth quarter, as factory upgrades and supplier renegotiations improved efficiency at the EV maker.】

item.title: 美国航空公司质疑拜登轮椅乘客保护规定
item.description: 美国主要航空公司和一个行业协会对拜登政府 12 月颁布的一项规定提出质疑，该规定要求为使用轮椅的残疾乘客提供新的消费者保护。【原文：Major U.S. airlines and a trade association have challenged a Biden administration rule issued in December requiring new consumer protections for disabled passengers using wheelchairs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亿万富翁投资人 Ryan Cohen 将所持阿里巴巴股份增至 10 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，亿万富翁投资者瑞安-科恩（Ryan Cohen）最近几个月在中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团的个人持股增至约10亿美元，约合700万股。【原文：Billionaire investor Ryan Cohen has in recent months grown his personal stake in Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba Group to roughly $1 billion, or about 7 million shares, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗集团加入企业退出多元化倡议的行列
item.description: 花旗集团首席执行官周四在一份备忘录中表示，花旗集团将不再要求求职面试的候选人具有多样性，因为美国企业正在应对唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的新商业环境。【原文：Citigroup will no longer require a diverse slate of candidates for job interviews, its CEO said in a memo on Thursday, as corporate America contends with a new business climate under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行提前对 Banco BPM 的竞购进行投票，增加可发行股票数量
item.description: 联合信贷银行周四表示，董事会已将原定于 4 月 10 日举行的股东投票提前至 3 月 27 日，以批准发行新股为收购 Banco BPM 提供资金。【原文：UniCredit said on Thursday its board has moved up to March 27 a shareholder vote previously scheduled for April 10 to approve issuing new shares to finance a takeover bid for Banco BPM .】

item.title: 英特尔反犹太主义诉讼被驳回
item.description: 英特尔公司一名犹太裔前雇员指控该芯片制造商在他投诉一名公开反犹太主义的主管后将其解雇，该诉讼已被驳回。【原文：A lawsuit in which a Jewish former employee of Intel accused the chipmaker of firing him after he complained about an openly antisemitic supervisor has been dismissed.】

item.title: 空中客车将在数周内与 Spirit Aero 签订协议：首席财务官
item.description: 空中客车公司首席财务官周四表示，作为航空结构制造商跨大西洋分拆的一部分，该公司预计将在未来几周内敲定收购 Spirit AeroSystems 公司部分欧洲业务的协议。【原文：Airbus expects to firm up a deal to take over some of Spirit AeroSystems European operations in the next few weeks, the planemaker's CFO said on Thursday, as part of a transatlantic breakup of the aerostructures manufacturer.】

item.title: 百事公司与美国大公司一起调整可持续发展政策
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统（Donald Trump）推动在联邦政府和私营部门废除多元化、公平和包容计划，越来越多的美国大公司正在对其多元化、公平和包容计划进行改革，百事公司也加入了这一行列。【原文：PepsiCo has joined the growing list of major U.S. companies that are making changes to their diversity, equity and inclusion programs as President Donald Trump pushes to dismantle the practice across the federal government and private sector.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔卸任监管职务，警告不要削弱银行规则
item.description: 美联储最高监管官员周四警告说，不要削弱银行规则和监督，否则可能会使企业容易受到意外冲击。【原文：The Federal Reserve's top regulatory official cautioned Thursday against a weakening of bank rules and oversight that could make firms vulnerable to surprise shocks.】

item.title: 美国监管机构撤回对国债市场规则的上诉
item.description: 据周三提交的一份法庭文件显示，美国证券交易委员会已决定撤回其对联邦法官去年底做出的一项决定的上诉，该决定撤销了对财资交易商规则的全面修订。【原文：U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has decided to withdraw its appeal of a decision by a federal judge late last year to vacate an overhaul of Treasury dealer rules, according to a court document filed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院命令 X 公司支付 140 万美元
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）周四发布的一份法院判决书称，社交媒体平台 X 因不遵守司法命令而被勒令支付 810 万雷亚尔（约合 142 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Brazilian Supreme Court justice Alexandre de Moraes ordered social media platform X to pay a fine of 8.1 million reais ($1.42 million) for noncompliance with judicial orders, according to a court decision issued on Thursday.】

item.title: 投资者向 "关税狂人 "特朗普虚张声势，市场对贸易的不安情绪逐渐消退
item.description: 几周前，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在关税问题上的每一句话都引发了市场的剧烈波动，但随着投资者将注意力转移到其他方面，并押注全面贸易战不会真正发生，这种波动已逐渐减弱。【原文：The outsized swings in markets on the back of Donald Trump's every word on tariffs just weeks ago have faded to mere flickers, as investors switch their focus elsewhere, and bet against a full-scale trade war really materialising.】
